    My Pokemon Go Journey

    Pokemon Go

    • Starter Pokemon
    • Starting Date
    • Playing History:
    • Highest CP Pokemon
    • Proudest Pokemon:
    • Strongest Pokemon:
    • My Best Shiny:
    • Favourite Pokemon:
    • My Favourite Shiny:

    Starter Pokemon

    Squirtle

    Starting Date

    25/7/2016, the day Pokemon Go was released in Hong Kong

    Playing History:

    Played a lot in 2016, a bit in 2017, a lot in 2018, a bit in 2021, and a lot in 2023 after my friend asked me to play (otherwise no motivation)

    Highest CP Pokemon

    Slaking… Aside from Slaking, Dragonite (3831 CP) with IV (15/14/15). Obtained through a trade with my friend.

    Moves: Dragon Tail + Outrage/Hurricane

    Proudest Pokemon:

    My first DITTO ever! (Caught on the day of Ditto release) is a hundo! (15/15/15)

    Strongest Pokemon:

    Shadow Mewtwo with Confusion+Psystrike

    My Best Shiny:

    Shiny Magikarp (HAHAHAHAHAHA)

    Favourite Pokemon:

    Articuno

    My Favourite Shiny:

    Shiny Rayquaza (Sigh)

    Tags: Go, Pokemon

    Updated: March 4, 2023
